biotools.summary: scArches is a package to integrate newly produced single-cell datasets into integrated reference atlases. Our method can facilitate large collaborative projects with decentralized training and integration of multiple datasets by different groups. scArches is compatible with scanpy. and hosts efficient implementations of several conditional generative models for single-cell data.
